meanings.definition: A tropical fruit with yellow-orange flesh.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious canistel for the first time today.
meanings.sent2: The canistel was ripe and sweet, perfect for a snack.
meanings.sent3: The canistel rolled off the table and surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a canistel in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The canistel's vibrant color made it stand out in the fruit bowl.

meanings.definition: The tree that produces the canistel fruit.
meanings.sent1: The canistel tree in our backyard provides us with fresh fruit every year.
meanings.sent2: The leaves of the canistel tree rustled in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent3: A squirrel climbed the canistel tree and stole some fruit.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the canistel tree reached towards the sky like fingers.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the canistel tree blossoms filled the air with sweetness.
